department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch: 2021-2030年是聯合國海洋永續發展的關鍵十年，本課程主要介紹遙感觀測海洋的機理及其在海洋學中的應用。海洋遙測是理解全球海洋系統的重要工具之一。本課程將藉由真實存在的海洋現象來讓同學了解海洋遙測的原理及資料的應用。同學在課程中可以同時認識海洋現象和基本的海洋性質。本課程包括基礎輻射物理學、海水表面溫度、紅外光與可見光遙感、海水表面鹽度與微波遙感、洋流與渦流、合成孔徑雷達和波浪、海面風場、行星波與大尺度海洋動力學、人類影響的大型海洋現象等(本課程不限任何科系背景，歡迎大學部選修)
goal.en: Ocean remote sensing is one of the important tools to understand the global ocean system. This course will let students understand the principles of ocean remote sensing and the application of data by using the example of real ocean phenomena. Students can understand ocean phenomena and basic ocean properties at the same time. .(This course is not limited to any academic background, welcome to undergraduate student)

outline.ch:
Week 1 (2023/09/13) 課程介紹
Week 2 (2023/09/20) 海洋遙測簡介
Week 3 (2023/09/27) 輻射物理學
Week 4 (2023/10/04) 影像與海洋水色
Week 5 (2023/10/11) 海水溫度與熱紅外遙測
Week 6 (2023/10/18) 可見光遙測
Week 7 (2023/10/25) 海水鹽度與微波遙測
Week 8 (2023/11/01) 期中作業 (不上課)
Week 9 (2023/11/08) 海洋流場與渦旋
Week 10 (2023/11/15) 合成孔徑雷達與波浪
Week 11 (2023/11/22) 海面風場
Week 12 (2023/11/29) 湧升流、海洋鋒面、海洋生態
Week 13 (2023/12/06) 陸棚、海灣與沿岸
Week 14 (2023/12/13) 行星波動與大尺度海洋動力
Week 15 (2023/12/20) 人類影響的海洋現象

outline.en:
Week 1 (2023/09/13) Curriculum＆ Instruction
Week 2 (2023/09/20) Introduction to ocean remote sensing
Week 3 (2023/09/27) Physics of Radiation
Week 4 (2023/10/04) Image and ocean color
Week 5 (2023/10/11) Sea temperature / Infrared Remote Sensing
Week 6 (2023/10/18) Visible Remote Sensing
Week 7 (2023/10/25) Sea Salinity / Microwave Remote Sensing
Week 8 (2023/11/01)  Mid-term Homework (no class)
Week 9 (2023/11/08)  Ocean currents and eddy
Week 10 (2023/11/15) Synthetic aperture radar and Waves
Week 11 (2023/11/22)  Wind over the sea
Week 12 (2023/11/29) Upwelling, fronts, ocean biology from space
Week 13 (2023/12/06) Shelf, estuary, and coastal region
Week 14 (2023/12/13) Planetary waves and large-scale ocean dynamics
Week 15 (2023/12/20) Large ocean phenomena with human impact
Week 16 (2023/12/27) Final-Report
